name: One Line-Connect all points
description:
* Use One line to solve this pattern *
Activate and train your brain. "One Line" has only one simple rule: Only one line is used to solve this pattern. Drawing with one line, the position of the starting point is not important. Think carefully before starting to connect points in this puzzle game, use your logic and remember - you can't draw the same line twice! It sounds funny, Right?

* Unlock new challenge levels *
Try to solve as many puzzles as you can, unlock new levels to get your brain to the top! Let us start the adventure in this colorful world and bring some freshness to your life!

* More pleasure for your brain *
Train your intelligence and reasoning skills to enhance your memory, attention, intellectual flexibility, concentration and responsiveness, and bring hours of fun to your mind anytime, anywhere!
